mapper.select: select a.* from (select row_number() over(order by b.seq desc) AS id, b.* from (select * from noticeArticle article left join user member on article.writer=member.nickname order by seq desc) b ) a
select a.* from (select row_number() over(order by b.seq desc) AS id, b.* from (select * from noticeArticle order by seq desc) b ) a where writer=#{writer}
select * from noticleArticle where writer=#{writer} and regdate=#{regdate}
select totalcomment from noticeArticle where writer=#{writer} and regdate=#{regdate}
select max(a.seq) as seq from (select seq from noticeArticle where writer=#{writer}) as a;
select writer, regdate from noticleArticle where seq=#{seq}
select likecount from noticeArticle where writer=#{writer} and regdate=#{regdate}
mapper.insert: insert into noticeArticle(title, writer, content) values(#{title}, #{writer}, #{content})
mapper.update: update noticeArticle set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, updatedate=now() where writer=#{writer} and regdate=#{regdate}
update noticleArticle set visitcnt=visitcnt+1 where writer=#{writer} and regdate=#{regdate}
mapper.delete: delete from noticeArticle where writer=#{writer} and regdate=#{regdate}
